answers.answer: Preeclampsia is dangerous for mom and baby if left undiagnosed and untreated. I lost my son and nearly my own life due to undiagnosed preeclampsia.  Not to scare you, but if you think you may have symptoms talk to your doctor ASAP. It's very important that you communicate with your ob.

question: Has anybody else had signs of this at the last week's of your pregnancy? What happens if you do have it?
title: pre eclampsia
